channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Photos: Highlights from the Winter Olympics opening ceremony
item.description: Athletes from around the world attended the 2026 Winter Olympics opening ceremony in Milan.

item.title: Trump posts racist meme of the Obamas — then deletes it
item.description: Trump's racist post came at the end of a minute-long video promoting conspiracy theories about the 2020 election.

item.title: Hate them or not, Patriots fans want the glory back in Super Bowl LX
item.description: As Bostonians bemoan their long years of suffering without a Super Bowl win, rival fans gripe that Title Town has become Entitled Town.

item.title: Trump's harsh immigration tactics are taking a political hit
item.description: President Trump's popularity on one of his political strengths is in jeopardy.

item.title: More than 30 killed in blast at Pakistan mosque, officials say
item.description: Almost 170 were injured in the explosion, which took place during Friday prayers in the capital Islamabad.

item.title: Analyzing rebranded Kamala HQ for Gen Z

item.title: Trump removes video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
item.description: The White House defended the post at first, calling to "stop the fake outrage", as members of both parties condemned the video.

item.title: Gazans returning through Rafah crossing describe checks by Palestinian militia
item.description: One Palestinian woman said members of the Israel-linked militia searched them and their belongings at an Israeli checkpoint inside Gaza.

item.title: Want to see Super Bowl 2026 commercials early? These ads are already live.
item.description: Many Super Bowl 60 ads are already online, along with teasers for commercials that will be unveiled during the NFL championship on Feb. 8.

item.title: Savannah Guthrie’s demand for mom’s ‘proof of life’ is complicated in this era of AI and deepfakes

item.description: Luigi Mangione appeared in a Manhattan courtroom Friday in the state's case against him for the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.

item.title: Norway's crown princess apologises after pressure over Epstein friendship
item.description: Mette-Marit says she is sorry to Norwegians for not realising what kind of person the late sex offender was.
